price: 86. Ce qui (vous) reste auprès d’Allah est bien meilleur pour vous, et je ne suis point votre gardien. »
arabic: بَقِيَّتُ ٱللَّهِ خَيۡرٞ لَّكُمۡ إِن كُنتُم مُّؤۡمِنِينَۚ وَمَآ أَنَا۠ عَلَيۡكُم بِحَفِيظٖ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: baqiyyatu al-lahi khayrun lakum in kuntum mu'minīna wamā anā ʿalaykum biḥafīẓin
